name: EasterEggHunt
0:
”Alexa, open Easter Egg hunt”
”Next to the fridge”
”In the fruit bowl”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: easter egg hunt
des:
The Easter Bunny has hidden a bunch of Easter Eggs, can you help Alexa find them?

This game is super simple, Easter Bunny arrives at the door and tells Alexa that there a some yummy Easter Eggs hidden throughout her house. Your job is to help Alexa decide where to look for them. After looking in the kitchen, living room and dining room you will get told the total number of Easter Eggs you found. 

Privacy Information
No personally identifiable information is requested by the skill. The skill does not store any customer information.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
